summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Plat 40W, page 110 of the Official Land Use Map, to rezone property located at 703 Columbia Street, from Highrise (HR) to Neighborhood Commercial 3 with a 160-foot height limit (NC3- 160) and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (Petition of Regional Trustee Services, C.F. 305861, Project Number 2202713)
